data.name: Num & Block -- Play game Series #13
data.description:
Play game Series #13:
Num & Block

# Welcome In this kata, we'll playing with an Android game `Num & Block`. ![](https://files.gitter.im/myjinxin2015/cW8G/blob) # Task You are given a `gameMap`. It's a 2D array of string. The goal of game is to move the player(a blue ball) to the exit(a yellow star). # Rules Try submit the initial solution to see the details of rules, blocks.. in test suit `Game Guide`. It looks like this: ![](https://files.gitter.im/myjinxin2015/REUb/blob) # Input - `gameMap`: The game map. It's a 2D array of string. The shape of game map always be a rectangle. In the array, `""` means the empty grids, and other strings mean the player, goal, or blocks(see more details in test suit `Game Guide`). # Output A string consisting of `"UDLR"`, where `U` for `up`, `D` for `down`, `L` for `left`, and `R` for `right`. # Note - All inputs are valid. - All testcases have at least one valid solution. - Two helpful game switches can be used: - `showEachStepOfGame` It can be used to debug your code. If you set it to `true`, the test suit will show the game map at each step. - `language` Two languages can be selected: "English" or "Chinese". - Please pay attention to the performance of your code. - You can search this game on web, download it and play(But I don't where can download the game, sorry). But, I bet you can't pass the game before you write the correct solution for this Kata. ;-) # Play Games series: - [Play Tetris : Shape anastomosis](http://www.codewars.com/kata/56c85eebfd8fc02551000281) - [Play FlappyBird : Advance Bravely](http://www.codewars.com/kata/play-flappybird-advance-bravely) - [Play PingPong : Precise control](http://www.codewars.com/kata/57542b169a4524d7d9000b68) - [Play PacMan : Devour all](https://www.codewars.com/kata/575c29d5fcee86cb8b000136) - [Play PacMan 2: The way home](https://www.codewars.com/kata/575ed46e23891f67d90000d8) - [Ins and Outs](https://www.codewars.com/kata/576bbb41b1abc47b3900015e) - [Three Dots](https://www.codewars.com/kata/three-dots-play-game-series-number-8) - [Flou](https://www.codewars.com/kata/5a93754d0025e98fde000048) - [Switch the Bulb](https://www.codewars.com/kata/5a96064cfd57777828000187) - [Calculator: The game](https://www.codewars.com/kata/5aefb889d2ee276a73000063) - [Number Maze](https://www.codewars.com/kata/5b9232629cc49d5a680003d9)
